mapper.insert: insert into user_tk (user_name, user_ps) values (#{userName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userPs, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update user_tk set user_ps = #{userPs, jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id} and user_name = #{userName}
mapper.delete: delete from user_tk where id = #{id, jdbcType=BIGINT} and user_name = #{userName, jdbcType=VARCHAR} and user_ps = #{userPs, jdbcType=VARCHAR};
